ygData.subject: Re: Grim Aura
ygData.msgSnippet: You regain your concentration and continue casting! Ever see that message? It seems to be happening more and more to me lately.  If I remember right off of
ygData.messageBody:
"You regain your concentration and continue casting!"

Ever see that message? It seems to be happening more and more to me lately. If I remember right off of the top of my head, both my Dex and Int is 90.

Very cool when that happens.

~Mysk

----- Original Message -----
From: Dennis Chan <dchan17@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 14, 1999 4:49 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Grim Aura


> From: "Dennis Chan" <dchan17@...>
>
> Hey Scout J. Geertgens:
> i am a Gnome Necro and i get 130 int and 5 points into Dex just becuase
> it's necro's primary attrib. I have been regretting it since then because
> Dex doesnt' seem to do anything for ya except help u not getting
> interrupted. However i have a feeling that i get interrupted no matter what
> when a monster hit me at 25+dmg a pop.
>
> Can u tell me why pour points into Dex(after max your int) is a good choice?
>
> thanx
